message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $115. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I understand your position, Bob, but $100 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $107?
I'm still not sure if $107 is the best price for me. How about we try $102?
